script.line: Prota?! What are you doing here?
No time! I need to get these flyers into the hands of the toddlers.
Aren't you supposed to be with Professor Marbels today? You--
Where are the kids?
...So, these flyers seem to indicate you lost the family dog.
I didn't lose her, exactly... She kinda... lost herself?
What's that mean?
She ran away! It was a whole thing.
And you want me to help you find her?
Close! I want your eagle-eyed class of dog-loving kiddos to help me find her.
Can I ask about the logic behind that, Prota?
No--
Oh beans! I forgot!
What's going on?
Refried beans! It's Burrito Day for lunchtime and I've got the refritos on the stovetop!
Can you watch the kids while I go take care of it?
Can I ask them about Minty?
...Use your judgment, Prota. I'll be back in five!
Okay!
Sounds like a yes to me. Hey kids! Have you seen this dog?
...Anyone?
I know where the minted one is.
Hi there little guy! Who are you?
I am the Young Sphinx. You may call me...Yung Sphinx.
Okay Yung Sphinx! Where's Minty?
I will tell you.
Okay!
In a riddle.
Oh! Uh... sure! I love riddles!
.Then you will love this.
I am short and I am tall. I am the oldest of them all.
WHAT AM I?!
